original_text: “But when he came to himself, he said, ‘How many of my father's hired servants have more than enough bread, but I perish here with hunger!
korean_text: 이에 스스로 돌이켜 이르되 내 아버지에게는 양식이 풍족한 품꾼이 얼마나 많은가 나는 여기서 주려 죽는구나

sentences.original_text: But when he came to himself,
‘How many of my father's hired servants have more than enough bread,
but I perish here with hunger!
